documentation.text: @dev The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.
@dev The constructor links DaiProxy to dai and controller.
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid"

arguments.value: DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid"

documentation.text: @dev The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.
@dev The constructor links DaiProxy to dai and controller.
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid"

arguments.value: DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "DaiProxy: Not enough yDai debt repaid"

devdoc.details: The DaiProxy is a proxy contract of Controller that allows users to immediately sell borrowed yDai for Dai, and to sell Dai at pool rates to repay YDai debt.

borrowDaiForMaximumYDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum yDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(daiProxy.address)`.

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumYDai: Maximum amount of YDai to borrow.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowDaiForMaximumYDaiBySignature(addre.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum yDai debt. Uses an encoded signature for controller

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.maximumYDai: Maximum amount of YDai to borrow.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowMinimumDaiForYDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(daiProxy.address)`.

params.minimumDaiToBorrow: Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.to: Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.

borrowMinimumDaiForYDaiBySignature(addre.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Uses an encoded signature for controller

params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.minimumDaiToBorrow: Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.to: Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.

constructor.details: The constructor links DaiProxy to dai and controller.

repayMinimumYDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, with a minimum of yDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(daiProxy.address)`.

params.minimumYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of yDai debt to repay.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to repay)
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.

repayMinimumYDaiDebtForDaiBySignature(ad.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, with a minimum of yDai debt required to be paid. Uses an encoded signature for pool

params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.minimumYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of yDai debt to repay.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to repay)
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.

repayYDaiDebtForMaximumDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(daiProxy.address)`.

params.maximumRepaymentInDai: Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to repay)
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.
params.yDaiRepayment: Amount of yDai debt to repay.

repayYDaiDebtForMaximumDaiBySignature(ad.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Uses an encoded signature for pool

params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.maximumRepaymentInDai: Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to repay)
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.
params.yDaiRepayment: Amount of yDai debt to repay.
